snippet.title: Evolving bacteria through a game of rock-paper-scissors
snippet.description: ..."Imagine a nontransitive community in which, for convenience, we call the players Rock, Paper, and Scissors." It's a rather unusual line to find in a scientific paper, but the study it comes from is part of a special edition of PNAS on the evolution of social behavior. And rock-paper...

snippet.title: Papers 2: your new best OS X research management app?
snippet.description: ...In 2007, a talented pair of scientist-programmers called Mekentosj released Papers, a Mac OS X app... of Papers with an iPad is pretty good when it comes to catching up on your reading. Still, that was then and this is now, as they say, and a new and rebuilt Papers 2 is here to take over your research...

snippet.title: Review: Paper Pilot for iPhone brings office flying fun
snippet.description: ...If flying a paper airplane to catch floating paperclips sounds like an appealing way to waste some time, then Paper Pilot for the iPhone is the game for you. In this first-person flier, you maneuver... your car into a nearby light post. Paper Pilot lets you control your speed as well as your angles...
